trans-unit.target: 你可以随时检视你的牌库顶牌。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·3 | Assemble the Players | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Once each turn, you may cast a creature spell with power 2 or less from the top of your library.
trans-unit.target: 限每回合一次，你可以从你牌库顶施放力量等于或小于2的生物咒语。

trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME离开战场时，将所放逐的牌移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: Call a Surprise Witness

trans-unit.resname: MKM·6 | Call a Surprise Witness | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.resname: MKM·7 | Case File Auditor | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Case File Auditor

trans-unit.resname: MKM·7 | Case File Auditor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield and whenever you solve a Case, look at the top six cards of your library. You may reveal an enchantment card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场或每当你侦办一个案件时，检视你牌库顶的六张牌。你可以展示其中一张结界牌并置于你手上。将其余的牌以随机顺序置于你牌库底。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·7 | Case File Auditor | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: You may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast Case spells.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将法术力视同任意颜色的法术力来施放案件咒语。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·8 | Case of the Gateway Express | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Case of the Gateway Express

trans-unit.resname: MKM·8 | Case of the Gateway Express | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When this Case enters the battlefield, choose target creature you don't control. Each creature you control deals 1 damage to that creature.
trans-unit.target: 当此案件进战场时，选择目标不由你操控的生物。每个由你操控的生物各对该生物造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·8 | Case of the Gateway Express | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: To solve — Three or more creatures attacked this turn. (If unsolved, solve at the beginning of your end step.)
trans-unit.target: 侦办～本回合中有三个或更多生物攻击过。（若本案未侦结，则在你的结束步骤开始时侦办。）

trans-unit.resname: MKM·8 | Case of the Gateway Express | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Solved — Creatures you control get +1/+0.
trans-unit.target: 侦结～由你操控的生物得+1/+0。

trans-unit.target: 侦结～如果将在你的操控下派出一个或数个衍生物，则改为派出该些衍生物加上一个线索衍生物。（它是具有「{2}，牺牲此神器：抓一张牌」的神器。）

trans-unit.source: {T}, Collect evidence 3: Add one mana of any color. Put an unlock counter on CARDNAME. (To collect evidence 3, exile cards with total mana value 3 or greater from your graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: {T}，搜证3：加一点任意颜色的法术力。在CARDNAME上放置一个解锁指示物。（搜证3的流程，是从你坟墓场中放逐法术力值加总达到3或更多的牌。）

trans-unit.resname: MKM·251 | Cryptex | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Sacrifice CARDNAME: Surveil 3, then draw three cards. Activate only if CARDNAME has five or more unlock counters on it.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲CARDNAME：刺探3，然后抓三张牌。只能于CARDNAME上有五个或更多解锁指示物时起动。
